Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameInterface
public class Game extends Object implements GameInterface
Class representing a game. It contains all managers and the nicknames of all players.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> nicknames, int numberCommonGoalCards) throws IOException
      Game's Constructor: it initializes this with a List of nicknames and a number of common goal cards.
      Parameters:
      nicknames - List containing the nicknames of the players.
      numberCommonGoalCards - Number of common goal cards. (It can be either to '1' or '2').
      Throws:
      IOException - error occurred with I/O for JSON configuration files.
